foreignData.name: Windschiefe Zauberflasche
foreignData.text:
1X, {T}: Lege X Ladungsmarken auf die Windschiefe Zauberflasche. Spiele diese Fähigkeit wie eine Hexerei.
Wenn auf der Windschiefen Zauberflasche zu Beginn Deiner Hauptphase Ladungsmarken liegen, tappe die Windschiefe Zauberflasche und entferne alle Ladungsmarken von ihr, um Deinen Manavorrat um farbloses Mana in Höhe der Anzahl der entfernten Ladungsmarken zu erhöhen.

name: Ventifact Bottle
originalText:
o1o
X, oc
T: Put X charge counters on Ventifact Bottle. Play this ability as a sorcery.
At the beginning of your main phase, if Ventifact Bottle has any charge counters on it, tap Ventifact Bottle and remove all charge counters from it to add to your mana pool an amount of colorless mana equal to the number of charge counters removed.
text:
{X}{1}, {T}: Put X charge counters on Ventifact Bottle. Activate only as a sorcery.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, if Ventifact Bottle has a charge counter on it, tap it and remove all charge counters from it. Add {C} for each charge counter removed this way.
